mapper.sql: id, partnerid, apiid, nowtime, productid, money, status, memo, delete_flag, createid, create_date, modifyid, modify_date
mapper.select:
select
from tb_api_count where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR} and delete_flag=0
mapper.insert: insert into tb_api_count (id, partnerid, apiid, nowtime, productid, money, status, memo, createid, modifyid,delete_flag, create_date, modify_date ) values(#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{partnerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{apiid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,now(),#{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{money,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{createid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{modifyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0,now(),now())
